pageContent: Objectives: The optimal management of locally advanced prostate cancer (cT3) is still a matter of debate. The objective of this study is to present 10-year outcomes of radical prostatectomy (RP) in unilateral cT3a disease.

metaData.source:
The Prostate Cancer Intervention Versus Observation Trial (PIVOT)
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/9268976/
